body_html: FYI - I noticed on the MNIST model / convultional.py in tensorflow, if you run it on a Pascal chip set (ie 1080) and are using the v4 of cuDNN with the tensorflow GPU Linux binary, the resulting model is incorrect (90% testing error). Should be checked once the compile issue is resolved.

body: FYI - I noticed on the MNIST model / convultional.py in tensorflow, if you run it on a Pascal chip set (ie 1080) and are using the v4 of cuDNN with the tensorflow GPU Linux binary, the resulting model is incorrect (90% testing error). Should be checked once the compile issue is resolved.
